content: Get instant email notifications about new shared files/folders and activity inside your {{sectionName}}.

comment.text: This text describes the benefit of enabling notifications for activity within a specific section (e.g., a room or workspace). It appears as a description next to a toggle button that allows users to subscribe to email notifications about new shared files, folders, or activity. Translators should ensure the translation conveys the idea of receiving updates about actions within a designated area.
